intro.headline: See Your Melody in Motion: The Ultimate Piano Recording App!
intro.bodytext: Bring your piano playing to life in a whole new way. Record yourself and watch as the keys you press illuminate on a virtual keyboard, all thanks to seamless MIDI connection.
intro.footer-note: On the free plan the recording time is limited to 15 seconds. No account required.
intro-connection.headline: Establish MIDI Connection
intro-connection.bodytext.connect-advice: Connect your device to any MIDI keyboard to enjoy the full glance of our app.
intro-connection.bodytext.bechstein-note: If you connect a C. Bechstein MIDI instrument, the 15-second recording limit is removed and you can record for an unlimited time.

settings.upgrade.title: Creator Pro
settings.upgrade.headline: Your Story Deserves More
settings.upgrade.bodytext: Say goodbye to 15-second restrictions. Your creativity knows no bounds – so why should your recording time? Upgrade now and tell your stories in full length!
home.dialog.no-connection.title: MIDI Connection
home.dialog.no-connection.body: Please connect a MIDI keyboard via USB or Bluetooth.
modal.upgrade.title: Creator Pro
modal.upgrade.headline: Your Story Deserves More
modal.upgrade.bodytext:
While our app is generaly free to check out, the recording time is limited to 15 seconds. 

Upgrade to Pro to unlock the Pro features like unlimited recording time and removal of the watermark.
